doc.title: Momma
doc.plot: 40 years of sex, murder and madness in Sin City, South "MOMMA" tells the tale of: in 1927 the King of Krewe was killed on the eve of Mardi Gras on the same infamous night that two men: an Al Capone henchman and a former professional boxer, had a deadly fight over the love of Madame Momma. Now, in 1967, the New Orleans' playboy District Attorney has decided to make a name for himself by finally bringing justice to the King of the Krewe's death. Between gangland gunshots and powerful punches, the DA struggles to separate fact from fiction as Momma's re-telling brings revelations that forever change 'the quarter.'
